text: Modern hip replacements are not very painful. Even right after the surgery, I had no pain while sitting still, lying down or standing up. Walking was painful but not too bad. Go for it. All the old arthritis pain was gone the minute the surgery was over.

text: I wish NFL RedZone would not use its dual-box screen. It shrinks the pictures too much. So instead of having one red-zone play or another, you end up struggling to see either. Why not play one and tape the other? It’s not as if they don’t do replays.

text: Dems clearly think they have Trump over a barrel on the shutdown. There’s a deal to be had — DACA for the wall — but they won’t make that deal as long as they think they can humiliate him on the wall. Trump apparently thinks the shutdown gives him leverage. Dubious proposition.

text: Too much of the criticism of Trump has been overblown, too often about things that either didn’t happen or didn’t matter. That is not true of Syria/Mattis. This is a big deal, both in the substance of the Trump decisions and the way the whole episode was handled.
